entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Environment variable is not set when running published desktop app #71104
  • CoreCLR tests fail to execute if .NET 7 Preview 4 is installed on the machine #71099
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] `SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandlerTest.GetAsync_ManyDifferentResponseHeaders_ParsedCorrectly` fails with `(Unexpected EOF trying to read request header)` #71096
  • Add Function Pointer support to Mono Reflection #71095
  • Grpc bidirectional streaming doesn't work with WinHttpHandler. #71093
  • [API Proposal]: ImmutableDictionary.SetItems(params ValueTuple<TKey, TValue>[] Values) #71092
  • Grpc bidirectional streaming doesn't work with WinHttpHandler. #71088
  • Review issues with the `area-CrossGen-NGEN` label. #71087
  • [JIT] Update loop integrity checks #71084
    7.0.0
  • [ppc64le] Runtime crash in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests #71080
  • [ppc64le] System.Collections.Concurrent.Tests timeout #71079
  • Clean up Windows 7/8 specific logic in Cryptographic features #71075
    Future
  • JsonPatchDocument does not work properly with JsonNode objects #71074
  • [Mono] Synchronize mono's GCMemoryInfo.MemoryLoadBytes with CoreCLR changes #71073
  • [mono] Do not collect uninflated generic methods for AOT compilation #71072
    Future
  • [libraries-pgo] SIGSEGV in libclrjit.so!Compiler::optMarkLoopRemoved(unsigned int) #71071
    7.0.0
  • Include runtime flavor and platform information into .mibc Profile #71065
  • creating mTLS connection in win2019 server returns "The Local Security Authority cannot be contacted" error #71064
  • NativeAOT when building shared library #71063
  • OKTA Saml2 Signing Certs fail to validate in .net 6, same cert works fine in .net 3.1 #71062
  • `libnethost.lib` appears to be built with LTCG, making it unusable with non-MSVC toolchains #71056
  • Internal connection fatal error when connecting from linux docker to mysql/mysql-server docker container #71055
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_RustLang_Sherlock #71070
  • Regressions in Exceptions.Handling #71069
  • Regressions from JitConsumeProfileForCasts #71068
  • Regressions in Benchstone.BenchF.Whetsto #71067
  • Regression from hoisting out of nested loop #71059
  • AVs in emitDispJumpList #71049
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add readme about how to run the template #71047
    7.0.0
  • thdlist test crashes with ArgumentNullException on mono llvmaot #71041
  • Possible regression: ConfigurationBinder cannot bind private properties of base classes #71040
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Net.Security.Tests.CertificateValidationRemoteServer.ConnectWithRevocation_StapledOcsp(offlineContext: False) #71037
  • Test failure: System.Threading.Channels.Tests.BoundedChannelTests.ManyProducerConsumer_ConcurrentReadWrite_WithBufferedCapacity_Success - NullReferenceException #71035

Closed

  • Large Amount of Spinning during ETW Collection and JIT Compilation #8335
    Future
  • Finally statement is not always been executed in Linux container #67214
  • [wasm][tests][aot] Test failure in `System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.ReflectionOnly.Tests` #51679
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][aot] Windows: Test failures for `System.Globalization.Extensions.Tests` #58708
    7.0.0
  • Assert failure: Consistency check failed: Crst Level violation: Can't take level 17 lock CrstInstMethodHashTable because you already holding level 17 lock CrstInstMethodHashTable #71023
    7.0.0
  • Using PlaintextStreamFilter results in PROTOCOL_VIOLATION error over HTTP/2 #71030
    7.0.0
  • [libraries-pgo]: Assertion failed 'fgDominate(head, entry)' in 'System.Text.Encoding:GetByteCount(System.String,int,int):int:this' during 'Hoist loop code' (IL size 109; hash 0x10278d31; Tier1) #70802
    7.0.0
  • [libraries-pgo] Assertion failed '(h->bbJumpKind == BBJ_COND) && (h->bbNext == loop.lpEntry)' during 'Clone loops' #70569
    7.0.0
  • .NET console logging uses a blocking collection which is not optimal for cloud-native applications #65264
    7.0.0
  • Can't Publish Runtime Test Projects #61978
  • .NET 6: JsonContent.Create(obj) should set Content-Length HTTP request header #70793
    7.0.0
  • Can get stuck in SslStream.EnsureFullTlsFrameAsync for unknown reason #70656
  • Added HttpMessageHandler but ports are still in TIME_WAIT #70855
  • ManagedWebSocket throws annoying error when connection is aborted in ReceiveAsync. #71012
    7.0.0
  • `StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase` compares `"¡a"` and `"¡B"` incorrectly #71018
    7.0.0
  • 2x RPS improvement in Json-https benchmark. why? #71060
  • [libraries-pgo] Assertion failed '(igInLoop->igLoopBackEdge == nullptr) || (igInLoop->igLoopBackEdge == igLoopHeader)' during 'Generate code' #70152
    7.0.0
  • cli xUnit tests fail since https://github.com/dotnet/runtime build 20220616.9 #70973
    7.0.0
  • [mono] iOS - Size reduction: don't emit impossible generic function instantiations #54850
    7.0.0
  • IConfiguration returns null values if appsettings.json isn't in current work directory #71052
  • ClientWebsocket KeepAliveInterval keeps spawning more keep alive messages in some cases #69684
  • [wasm][debugger] Automatically show the values of the getter of a property. #61149
    7.0.0
  • Expose a high level NTAuth Negotiate API #29270
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose a high level authentication API #69920
    7.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices\\threading\\generics\\Monitor\\EnterExit04\\EnterExit04.cmd #70968
  • Test failure baseservices\\threading\\generics\\threadstart\\GThread23\\GThread23.cmd #71036
  • [wasm][aot] Windows: Test failures for `System.IO.FileSystem.Tests` #58707
    7.0.0
  • JIT assert if a retyped simd32 is CSE'd and needs to have the upper half saved/restored #35620
    7.0.0
  • Blazor webassembly on DotNet 5 rc2 missing globalization for Bosnian month names #43398
    7.0.0
  • Enumerable.Chunk remarks slightly incorrect #71016
  • Cannot PublishReadyToRun as Visual Studio Passing too Many Arguments to Crossgen2.exe #70712
    7.0.0
  • Test `System.Tests.TimeZoneInfoTests.LocalTzIsNotUtc` is failing on Android #70482
    7.0.0
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/pauseonstart/pauseonstart/pauseonstart.sh #66368
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Text.Json.Tests.Perf_Get.GetDateTime #69447
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove SString::UIndex and SString::UIterator as they are never used. #71103
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Reduce some allocations parsing certificates on Windows #71102
    area-System.Security
  • Change SString::GetUTF8NoConvert to GetUTF8 that converts the SString #71101
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Cross module inlining take2 #71100
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Use SequenceEqual in SslCredKey.Equals #71097
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fix #70849: Print LARGEJMP instruction on ARM64 #71094
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • Delete duplicate helper in HttpConnection.cs #71091
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Simplify and improve SocketAddress.Equals #71090
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Disable LTCG when building libnethost.lib for Windows. #71089
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add idIsBound() check in emitDispJumpList() #71086
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make GC Stress 4/8 work with CET #71085
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Work around for UriFormatException caused by \\?\ prefix in the path #71082
    area-System.Configuration
  • Delete `fgMorphGetStructAddr` #71078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid OOMing in very large functions when checking LIR #71066
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Not generate deps and config file for native aot apps #71061
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • 53095 enable diagnostics test #71058
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Add support for building WASM variants alongside single-threaded to the build system #71054
    area-Build-mono
  • Mark simple.ilproj and nested.ilproj ilasm/ildasm roundtrip incompatible #71048
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Native Digits Support #71045
    area-System.Globalization, 7.0.0
  • ConfigurationBinder should support binding private properties from ba… #71039
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Fix Tar timestamp conversion from/to string and DateTimeOffset #71038
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Exposing AcosPi, AsinPi, Atan2Pi, AtanPi, CosPi, SinPi, and TanPi for ITrigonometricFunctions #71033
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix the heuristics for L3 cache size for Arm64 #71029
    area-GC-coreclr

Merged

  • Align arm64 data section as requested #71044
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][aot] Enable `DataContractSerializerTests.DCS_DerivedTypeWithDifferentOverrides` #71083
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, wasm-aot-test, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][aot] Enabled `System.Globalization.Extensions.Tests` #71077
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, wasm-aot-test, 7.0.0
  • [Mono] Fix C4018 warnings round II #70783
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add CreateChained rate limiter API #70739
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Use crypto.subtle for HMAC on Browser WASM #70745
    arch-wasm, area-System.Security
  • Revert "Add support for cross module inlining and cross module generi…c compilation to Crossgen2 (#68919)" #71076
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Renaming files because they don't reflect the IL code used in the tests #69814
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [wasm] Migrate to ref/out param while reading data from typed array #70823
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Fixed :scheme header for H/2 with PlaintextStreamFilter #71057
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: avoid cloning mid-entry loops with multiple non-loop entry preds #70959
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: handle case where we are cloning adjacent sibling loops #70874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • fix: [Wasm] Add missing libicudata.a for native layout #70682
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix SIMD data overallocation #71043
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update workloads with Arcade improvements #71046
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: fix loop alignment issue #70936
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enabling console logger queue length and mode to be configurable #70186
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Add missing call to initiate thread abort with CET #71053
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Simplify random GDV #70980
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix reordering of call args on x86 #70931
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Switch to PREEMPT mode when calling CoTaskMem* APIs #71031
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Do not generate impossible instantiations for constrained generics in Mono AOT #70838
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix typo in GC_FORBID doc #71050
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Fix IPAddress equality comparison in MsQuicListener #70979
    area-System.Net
  • Implement NegotiateAuthentication API #70720
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Ensure consistent reflectability for generic methods #70977
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoid unnecessary allocations in SanitizeEntryFilePath #71034
    area-System.IO
  • set red zone size 512 for powerpc64. #70885
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Add markdown readme for System.Reflection.MetadataLoadContext #70610
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Move allocation of command line argument array to C# #71021
  • Fix Ordinal Ignore Case string compare #71022
    area-System.Globalization, 7.0.0
  • Use LastIndexOfAny in GetFileName_Windows #71032
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [Android] Make sure AdditionalTimeZoneChecks trait is added to xunit-excludes #70974
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove allocation in ImmutableArray Builder Sort #70850
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests: disable tests failing on CI #71020
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add TarEntry conversion constructors #70325
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0

Updated

  • DefaultBinder named parameter support skipping default parameters #71013
    area-System.Reflection
  • R2R -> instrumented tier0 -> optimized tier1 #70941
    area-VM-coreclr
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException throw helpers #69767
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Update DependencyGraphViewer to allow for DGML reading #70690
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Separate out char marshalling rules to a separate MarshallingGeneratorFactory. #71028
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [wasm]: JavaScript interop with [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes and Roslyn #66304
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Enable AES encryption on Browser WASM #70915
    area-System.Security
  • Optimize `HashCode.AddBytes` for inputs larger than 16 bytes. #70095
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • JSON contract customization #70435
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Move some CorElementType acquiring to managed #70987
    community-contribution
  • [mono] Extend MonoAOTCompiler Task #70851
    area-Build-mono
  • Assertion prop fix #70643
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Include all dlerror messages to DllNotFoundException #70964
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support long pdata unwinding and save_next for floating point regs in ARM64 #69906
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix ILGenerator maxstack computation #70388
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • JIT: arm64 osr funclet frame probing #70916
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement Tar Global Extended Attributes API changes #70869
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Try catch for unreachable host in AltSvc H/3 upgrade test #70993
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: Stop reordering arguments throwing distinct exceptions #70893
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable fake hot/cold splitting on ARM64 #70708
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][debugger] Support new hot reload features from runtime #70697
    area-EnC-mono
  • Implement UnixFileMode APIs #69980
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Implement NarrowUtf16ToAscii for AArch64 #70080
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • [iOS][Android] Fix crash in Exception.CaptureDispatchState #70970
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • [release/6.0] Correctly format chuncked response with Content-Length header #70744
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, tenet-compatibility, 6.0.8
  • [wasm][debugger] Enable onCallFrame evaluation of static fields in classes/interfaces from a static method. #70560
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Polyfill the incremental generator ForAttributeWithMetadataName from roslyn. #70911
  • Do not use full memory barrier for osx/arm64 #71026
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix SmtpClient reuse with SendAsync #70046
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.12 #70693
    area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Optimization. Use Min/Max intrinsics if one of arguments is constant. #69434
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Add MessageChannel between browser thread and new pthreads #70908
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Fix SpanHelpers.Reverse regression #70650
    area-System.Memory
  • [release/6.0] Fixing the handling of Positive NaN in Math.Min for float/double #70865
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics, 6.0.x
  • Arm64: Use csel and ccmp for conditional moves #67894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Relax Socket.EnableBroadcast getter exception behavior #70728
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Avoid some unnecessary signed casts #70884
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Additional policy for limiting RTT PINGs in SocketsHttpHandler #70995
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Set utf-8 for mono on msvc #70994
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • X509Certificates.Tests: make tests pass when rsa+sha1 signing is not supported. #70821
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Reflection.Metadata.Tests: make tests pass when rsa+sha1 signing is not supported. #69999
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • VM: Better strategy for TryReserveInitialMemory on arm64 (jump stubs) #70707
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Improve and simplify `MakeTmpArgNode` #71019
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement HTTP/2 WebSockets #70895
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [API Implementation]: Add `Order` and `OrderDescending` to `Enumerable` and `Queryable` #70525
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Optimize multi-dimensional array access #70271
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable string properties evaluation of Length and Char[]. #67028
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Update design docs to reflect our new marshaller design from partner feedback #71017
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Various cryptographic allocation improvements #71015
    area-System.Security
